column5: Hey Guys,  Anyone been to Mountsberg lately?  How is the water level?  Has the reservoir filled up a bit from the summer?
no, in fact the water level has DROPPED. I was there last weekend and could walk out onto "islands" that had been created by the dropped water level... oh and did I mention I caught no pike?

Hi Zeeter,  This time of year, water levels at Mountsberg tend to be on the low side.  As the summer progresses, the water levels continue to drop - especially if we had a substantially dry one.  I fished the reservoir once in the month of November and I had to walk 30 ft from the usual shoreline to launch my canoe.  -Sawyer
Wow ! Thanks, guys.   You saved me some time.  I'll have to find another place to go on.
i was there shore fishing in August....water level was super low. Still managed to catch one nice bass on a frog.
